      Parameters:
      log - the logger that logs the stack trace
      title - a descriptive title for the call stacks
      minInterval - the minimum time from the last

      title - a string title for the stack trace

    • getTaskName

      private static String getTaskName(long id, String name)

    • getOneArgStaticMethodAsFunction

      public static <I, R> Function<I,R> getOneArgStaticMethodAsFunction(Class<?> lookupClazz, String methodName, Class<I> argumentClazz, Class<R> returnValueClass) throws Throwable
      Creates a Function which can be called to performantly execute a reflected static method. The creation of the Function itself may not be fast, but executing that method thereafter should be much faster than invokeMethod(Object, String, Object...).
      Parameters:
      lookupClazz - the class to find the static method in
      methodName - the method name
      argumentClazz - the type of the argument
      returnValueClass - the type of the return value
      Returns:
      a function which when called executes the requested static method.
      Throws:
      Throwable - exception types from the underlying reflection

    • invokeMethod

      @NonNull public static Object invokeMethod(Object obj, String methodName, Object... params)
      Get and invoke the target method from the given object with given parameters
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to get and invoke method from
      methodName - the name of the method to invoke
      params - the parameters for the method to invoke
      Returns:
      the return value of the method invocation

      private static Class<?>[] getParameterTypes(Object[] params)
